content:
## MARKET OVERVIEW

1. What is the Current Market Regime?
CAUTION: low volatility (Vol: 13.1%) but narrow participation with weak breadth (2/8 sectors positive), signalling low-risk appetite despite calm markets.

2. Which sectors are leading?
Construction & REIT and Energy & Chemicals are leading: ALARK (1W: +4.49% | 1M: +9.86%) ABOVE TREND and EKGYO (1W: +3.55% | 1M: -0.10%) RECOVERY in C&REIT; GUBRF (1W: +10.93% | 1M: +13.18%) ABOVE TREND and TRALT (1W: +3.98% | 1M: +16.58%) ABOVE TREND in Energy.

3. Which sectors are lagging?
Technology & Telecom, Transportation and Banking are lagging: TCELL (1W: -3.92% | 1M: +2.58%) CORRECTION, PGSUS (1W: -4.53% | 1M: +0.74%) CORRECTION and AKBNK (1W: -3.55% | 1M: +8.63%) CORRECTION highlight the weakness.

## STOCK PERFORMANCE

4. Top Performing Stocks?
GUBRF (1W: +10.93% | 1M: +13.18%) ABOVE TREND; ASELS (1W: +7.11% | 1M: +22.55%) ABOVE TREND; ALARK (1W: +4.49% | 1M: +9.86%) ABOVE TREND; TRALT (1W: +3.98% | 1M: +16.58%) ABOVE TREND; TRMET (1W: +3.76% | 1M: +5.91%) ABOVE TREND.

5. Worst Performing Stocks?
KONTR (1W: -10.89% | 1M: -66.72%) BELOW TREND; KRDMD (1W: -6.12% | 1M: +4.57%) CORRECTION; PGSUS (1W: -4.53% | 1M: +0.74%) CORRECTION; YKBNK (1W: -4.51% | 1M: +0.40%) CORRECTION; VESTL (1W: -4.39% | 1M: -10.56%) BELOW TREND.

6. Momentum Stocks?
GUBRF (1W: +10.93% | 1M: +13.18%) ABOVE TREND and KONTR (1W: -10.89% | 1M: -66.72%) BELOW TREND show highest 1W moves, followed by ASELS (1W: +7.11% | 1M: +22.55%) ABOVE TREND, ALARK (1W: +4.49% | 1M: +9.86%) ABOVE TREND and TRALT (1W: +3.98% | 1M: +16.58%) ABOVE TREND.

## SECTOR OUTLOOK

7. Banking Sector Outlook?
Cautious: HALKB (1W: +3.47% | 1M: +7.13%) ABOVE TREND is a relative outperformer while AKBNK (1W: -3.55% | 1M: +8.63%) CORRECTION, ISCTR (1W: -3.50% | 1M: +1.42%) CORRECTION and YKBNK (1W: -4.51% | 1M: +0.40%) CORRECTION show short-term pullbacks.

8. Industrial Sector Outlook?
Mixed: ASELS (1W: +7.11% | 1M: +22.55%) ABOVE TREND and TOASO (1W: +3.22% | 1M: +9.12%) ABOVE TREND lead, while VESTL (1W: -4.39% | 1M: -10.56%) BELOW TREND and KRDMD (1W: -6.12% | 1M: +4.57%) CORRECTION lag.

9. Energy & Chemicals Outlook?
Selective strength: GUBRF (1W: +10.93% | 1M: +13.18%) ABOVE TREND and TRALT (1W: +3.98% | 1M: +16.58%) ABOVE TREND drive sector gains, TUPRS (1W: +0.27% | 1M: -4.69%) is in RECOVERY with mixed downstream signals.

## PORTFOLIO STRATEGY

10. Portfolio Recommendation?
Under CAUTION, trim cyclical beta and technology exposure, back quality winners in Construction & REIT and select Energy names, and use short-term weakness in laggards as selective re-entry points rather than broad buys.

## NEXT WEEK OUTLOOK

11. Stocks to Watch Next Week?
GUBRF (1W: +10.93% | 1M: +13.18%) ABOVE TREND for momentum follow-through; ASELS (1W: +7.11% | 1M: +22.55%) ABOVE TREND for defense on flows; ALARK (1W: +4.49% | 1M: +9.86%) ABOVE TREND for sector leadership; KONTR (1W: -10.89% | 1M: -66.72%) BELOW TREND for downside risk/relief trade.

12. Sectors to Watch Next Week?
Construction & REIT and Energy & Chemicals for continuation of leadership, plus Technology & Telecom to see if the current sell-off stabilizes or broadens.

13. Key Levels & Triggers?
Watch XU100 reaction to year-end flows and any FX or rate headlines; catalysts include oil prices, Q4 earnings headlines and CPI/central bank commentaryâ€”confirm sector moves on volume and follow-through above recent weekly highs or below the recent weekly lows.

EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
Calm market volatility (13.1%) masks narrow breadth (2/8), producing a CAUTION regime; leadership is concentrated in Construction & REIT and Energy while Banks, Tech and Transportation lag. Trade selectively: favor proven leaders for accumulation, trim high-beta and beaten-up names until breadth widens or volatility confirms a regime shift.
